title: Shouldn't Varus get a new main skin and lore??? (Its about the Darkin)
body:
Is it just me or is Varus's whole image confusing?
Varus is meant to be Darkin and yet he looks more like a dark elf. **(But he isn't in perfect control)** So why does he not look like the guy he took over?**(Because he took over two people, merging them together)** Those two guys were Valmar and Kai neither had long or white hair like varus and there are many other differences. **(The circumstances were different to other darkin who's weapons were just picked up and in his lore, it states "What emerged from the well was a gestalt creature, pale and inhumanly beautiful, part human and part darkin." this means that Varus isn't just a Darkin anymore he is Human-Darkin hybrid making his art style different.)** Or maybe Riot was too lazy to change his looks because remember first came out varus as a champion then after some time they changed his lore to make him a darkin.

This is what's happening in my head when I think about varus. in my opinion, his skin and lore should be changed.

Tell me what are your thoughts on the matter and let's have a vote
"**Change his current skin and lore** or **leave him as he is?**"
{{sticker:vlad-salute}}

replies.body: Honestly it was a bad idea to make him a darkin in the first place.
If they don't change his name to Vaarus they should just ditch the darkin idea overall.

"We all agreed on the double 'A' thing, Varus. The double 'A' thing!"
 "Varus, 'V' 'A' 'R' 'U' 'S', your name should have an 'A' and then another 'A', Varus. There was a memo, Varus, there was a memo!"
-Aatrox-
I totally agree.
It's already been confirmed that all darkin do not have double aas. Valeeva, who is believed to be his missing sister, is another example of this.

he's basically in a kayn situation but with 2 dudes. 

there's no point in changing his model if you're gonna change his lore and vice versa. he'll most likely get a VO update at some point and maybe some slight model changes.  Darkin can reshape flesh, so this might just have been close to how varus looked pre sealing. Visually he's fine for his current lore as trash as it is.

he coulda been some guy that overcame the darkin in the bow, but instead we got "kayn but it's 2 gay dudes".
